page.title: 01Our Area
page.content: Our area is part of the town of {Annan}and the land to the north and west which is mostly farmland. Annan lies on the river of the same name, which runs into the northern shores of the{Solway Firth.}The town lies on the main{A75 'Euro-route'}to Northern Ireland and is only some 15km from the border with England. Annan has expanded greatly as a town, the population having almost doubled since the end of the Second World War. Our block contains the north- western area of the town, which consists almost completely of housing estates, mostly council, both pre-war and post-war, as well as some modern private housing. Plans are currently being approved for a{by-pass}which will run through the area under review.
